Parameters.Name: RECORDING-2-1-6 START RECORDING ON MEDIA PROFILE - DELETE JOB

Test.TestName: FEATURES
Test.Name: Correct response on GetCapabilities and GetServises
Test.Description: DUT returns correct GetCapabilitiesResponse message DUT returns GetServicesResponse message

ExpectedResult.TestSummary: GetCapabilities: supported GetServices: supported RecordingControl: supported Digest: supported

Test.TestName: START RECORDING ON MEDIA PROFILE - DELETE JOB
Test.Name: Correct response. Notification is received at first attempt
Test.Description: Annex A.5: Profile is found Annex A.6: GetServices is supported DynamicRecording is True Notification is received at first attempt

Test.TestName: START RECORDING ON MEDIA PROFILE - DELETE JOB
Test.Name: Annex A.5: MediaProfile not found
Test.Description: Annex A.5: Profile is not found Profile is created at first attempt The first VSC has VECs There is VEC with required codec in GetCompatibleVEC response Annex A.6: GetServices is supported DynamicRecording is True Notification is received at first attempt

Test.TestName: START RECORDING ON MEDIA PROFILE - DELETE JOB
Test.Name: Annex A.5: no VECs
Test.Description: Annex A.5: Profile is not found Profile is created at first attempt All VSCs has no VECs There is VEC with required codec in GetCompatibleVEC response

ExpectedResult.TestSummary:
RECORDING-2-1-6 START RECORDING ON MEDIA PROFILE - DELETE JOB
STEP 1 - Get Recording Service address Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 2 - Connect to Recording service Recording service address: http://localhost:3246/onvif/ServiceRecording10/RecordingService.asmx STEP PASSED
STEP 3 - Get Service Capabilities Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 4 - Validate recording capabilities STEP PASSED
STEP 5 - Get Media service address Transmit done Receive done Media service address: http://localhost:3246/onvif/ServiceMedia10/MediaService.asmx STEP PASSED
STEP 6 - Get Media profiles Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 7 - Check that the DUT returned list of profiles STEP PASSED
STEP 8 - Create profile Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 9 - Getting video source configurations compatible with profile [token = 'TestProfile1'] Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 10 - Adding video source configuration [token = 'VSC1'] to profile [token = 'TestProfile1'] Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 11 - Getting video encoder configurations compatible with profile [token = 'TestProfile1'] Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 12 - Adding video source configuration [token = 'VSC2'] to profile [token = 'TestProfile1'] Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 13 - Getting video encoder configurations compatible with profile [token = 'TestProfile1'] Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 14 - Adding video source configuration [token = 'VSC3'] to profile [token = 'TestProfile1'] Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 15 - Getting video encoder configurations compatible with profile [token = 'TestProfile1'] Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 16 - Check that profile for the test has been prepared No ready to use profile can be found and no profile can be updated to use one of supported encoders STEP FAILED
STEP 17 - Deleting media profile [token = 'TestProfile1']

Test.TestName: START RECORDING ON MEDIA PROFILE - DELETE JOB
Test.Name: Annex A.5: MediaProfile not found-2
Test.Description: Check MediaProfile creation at second attempt. Check restoring procedure of deleted profile. Annex A.5: Profile is not found Profile is not created at first attempt The first VSC has VECs There is VEC with required codec in GetCompatibleVEC response Annex A.6: GetServices is supported DynamicRecording is True Notification is received at first attempt

Test.TestName: START RECORDING ON MEDIA PROFILE - DELETE JOB
Test.Name: Annex A.5: MediaProfile configuration-1
Test.Description:
Check founding if VEC with required codec Annex A.5: Profile is not found Profile is created at first attempt GetCompatibleVEC has no VEC with required codec (GetVECOptions step is followed) Required codec is found for the first VEC
Annex A.6: GetServices is supported DynamicRecording is True Notification is received at first attempt

Test.TestName: START RECORDING ON MEDIA PROFILE - DELETE JOB
Test.Name: Annex A.5: MediaProfile configuration-2
Test.Description:
Check founding if VEC with required codec Annex A.5: Profile is not found Profile is created at first attempt GetCompatibleVEC has no VEC with required codec (GetVECOptions step is followed) The first GetVECOptions contains no requred codec (Remove VEC step is followed) Required codec is found for the first VEC
Annex A.6: GetServices is supported DynamicRecording is True Notification is received at first attempt

Test.TestName: START RECORDING ON MEDIA PROFILE - DELETE JOB
Test.Name: Incorrect CreateRecordingJobResponse
Test.Description:
DUT sends CreateRecordingJobResponse for receiver instead of MediaProfile
Annex A.5: Profile is found Annex A.6: GetServices is supported DynamicRecording is True Notification is received at first attempt

Test.TestName: START RECORDING ON MEDIA PROFILE - DELETE JOB
Test.Name: Annex A.10: Recording is deleted at first attempt
Test.Description: Annex A.5: Profile is found Annex A.6: GetServices is supported DynamicRecording is True Annex A.10: MaxRecordings = GetRecordings Recording is deleted at first attempt Notification is received at first attempt

Test.TestName: START RECORDING ON MEDIA PROFILE - DELETE JOB
Test.Name: Annex A.10: Recording is not deleted at first attempt
Test.Description: Annex A.5: Profile is found Annex A.6: GetServices is supported DynamicRecording is True Annex A.10: MaxRecordings = GetRecordings Recording is not deleted at first attempt Notification is received at first attempt

Test.TestName: START RECORDING ON MEDIA PROFILE - DELETE JOB
Test.Name: Annex A.10: Recording is not deleted at first attempt-2
Test.Description: Annex A.5: Profile is found Annex A.6: GetServices is supported DynamicRecording is True Annex A.10: MaxRecordings = GetRecordings Recording is not deleted at first attempt (Other fault) Notification is received at first attempt

Test.TestName: START RECORDING ON MEDIA PROFILE - DELETE JOB
Test.Name: Annex A.10, A.6: All recording can not deleted
Test.Description: Annex A.5: Profile is found Annex A.6: GetServices is supported DynamicRecording is True Annex A.10: MaxRecordings = GetRecordings All Recording is not deleted Notification is received at first attempt

Test.TestName: START RECORDING ON MEDIA PROFILE - DELETE JOB
Test.Name: Annex A.10: empty recording list
Test.Description: Annex A.5: Profile is found Annex A.6: GetServices is supported DynamicRecording is True Annex A.10: Empty recording list (correct response) Notification is received at first attempt

Test.TestName: START RECORDING ON MEDIA PROFILE - DELETE JOB
Test.Name: Annex A.5: No media profiles
Test.Description: Annex A.5: GetProfiles - empty profile list Profile is created Annex A.6: GetServices is supported DynamicRecording is True Notification is received at first attempt

Test.TestName: START RECORDING ON MEDIA PROFILE - DELETE JOB
Test.Name: Annex A.6: DynamicRecording is false
Test.Description: Annex A.5: Profile is found Annex A.6: GetServices is supported DynamicRecording is false There is Recording with VIDEO track Annex A.10: MaxRecordings = GetRecordings All Recording is not deleted Notification is received at first attempt

Test.TestName: START RECORDING ON MEDIA PROFILE - DELETE JOB
Test.Name: Annex A.6: DynamicRecording is false-2
Test.Description: Annex A.5: Profile is found Annex A.6: GetServices is supported DynamicRecording is false There is not Recording with VIDEO track Annex A.10: MaxRecordings = GetRecordings All Recording is not deleted Notification is received at first attempt

Test.TestName: START RECORDING ON MEDIA PROFILE - DELETE JOB
Test.Name: Correct response - notification is received with second attempt

Test.TestName: START RECORDING ON MEDIA PROFILE - DELETE JOB
Test.Name: GetRecordingJobState: incorrect sources.state
Test.Description: Annex A.5: Profile is found Annex A.6: GetServices is supported DynamicRecording is True Notification is received at first attempt DUT sends GetRecordingJobState response message with sources.state=Active

Test.TestName: START RECORDING ON MEDIA PROFILE - DELETE JOB
Test.Name: No notifications

Test.TestName: START RECORDING ON MEDIA PROFILE - DELETE JOB
Test.Name: Notification is not received: first message is "not our" and "too new"

Test.TestName: START RECORDING ON MEDIA PROFILE - DELETE JOB
Test.Name: A.7 Notification with Active state is not received
Test.Description: Annex A.5: Profile is found Annex A.6: GetServices is supported DynamicRecording is True Notification with Active state is not received

Test.TestName: START RECORDING ON MEDIA PROFILE - DELETE JOB
Test.Name: A7: Notify message with Active state is too new
Test.Description: Annex A.5: Profile is found Annex A.6: GetServices is supported DynamicRecording is True Notification with Active state is not received

Test.TestName: START RECORDING ON MEDIA PROFILE - DELETE JOB
Test.Name: A7 Notify messages for other RecordingJobToken
Test.Description: Annex A.5: Profile is found Annex A.6: GetServices is supported DynamicRecording is True Notification is received at first attempt

Test.TestName: START RECORDING ON MEDIA PROFILE - DELETE JOB
Test.Name: Incorrect State in GetRecordingJobState
Test.Description: Annex A.5: Profile is found Annex A.6: GetServices is supported DynamicRecording is True Notification is received at first attempt State is not equal to Idle in GetRecordingJobState

Test.TestName: START RECORDING ON MEDIA PROFILE - DELETE JOB
Test.Name: Incorrect RecordingToken in GetRecordingJobState
Test.Description: Annex A.5: Profile is found Annex A.6: GetServices is supported DynamicRecording is True Notification is received at first attempt Incorrect RecordingToken in GetRecordingJobStateResponse
